title: Thai coastal communities unite against the Chana industrial project
summary: On the evening of December 6, 2021, community members from Chana District encamped outside the Thai Government House in Bangkok. They came to remind the government of its promise to put on hold the controversial Chana industrial project that could potentially harm the local environment and their homeland. Despite their peaceful protest, 36 members of the Chana community were arrested by government agents.
